editor.label: Application server - IIS assignapptoapppool
editor.description: Assigns an application to an application pool.

formElement.label: Application Pool Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Application Pool to assign the application. i.e: 'FirstAppPool'.

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the application to assign. i.e: '/test'.

formElement.label: Website Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the site that contains the app to assign. i.e: 'Default Web Site'.
